name: nuclide-remote-atom
description: Client side of command-line interface for communicating with nuclide-server

shouldNotifyWhenCommandLineIsWaitingOnFi.title: Notify when the command line is waiting on an open file.
shouldNotifyWhenCommandLineIsWaitingOnFi.description: Show a notification when a file is opened locally and the command line is waiting for the file to be closed.

enableLocalCommandService.title: Runs a local service so that other programs on your machine can talk to Atom programmatically.
enableLocalCommandService.description: For example, this makes it possible to talk to your local Atom instance via the command line. Note this adds a small startup cost to Atom.
